issue.title: crast.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://crast.net/83227/google-talk-is-ending-support-for-the-third-party-xmpp-apps-that-kept-it-running/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcrast.net%2F83227%2Fgoogle-talk-is-ending-support-for-the-third-party-xmpp-apps-that-kept-it-running%2F) ### Comment Username: @scrutinizer11 > The page detects AdGuard, blurs the contents preventing the reading, and raises a corresponding warning message. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/9Q2nExr.png)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block third-party Authorization header,
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block Location API,
Block Java,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (),
Hide your User-Agent (),
Hide your IP address (250.167.76.76) DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
